updates.title: VAICOM PRO Community Edition for DCS World
updates.releasenotes: Release canditate, New Vaicom pro manual, Adds Tac Turns for Ai flight recipients, Minor fix for Export.cs, Support for Whisper Attack, Remove wildcards from keywords, Adds additional command aliases ***REQUIRES Reset of Keywords database in UI and finish steps***, Change Vaicom DX loop speed, fix Nellis Control typo, Better clarification of hooking on PTT Tab on Vaicom UI, more bug fixes due to typos, completed Afghanistan Chatter theme, Adds F-5E Flaming Cliffs version (WIP) still crash DCS if Vaicom running on slotting, Adds community Super Hornet mod F/A-18E/F and EA-18G.
